Open Svox Classic TTS app to browse the voice catalog and download a trial/full voice for your language.</p><p>== NOTES == <br>1. Google Navigation requires that the Text-to-Speech voice matches the phone language. You can change the phone language in Android Settings -&gt; Language &amp; keyboard -&gt; Select language . </p><p>2. On Android 2.1 and earlier, only some apps, like Google Translation, support changing voices.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> href="/store/apps/details?id=io.vov.vitamio" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=io.vov.vitamio" title="Vitamio Plugin ARMv7+NEON"> 21.    Vitamio Plugin ARMv7+NEON  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=YIXIA+INC." title="YIXIA INC.">YIXIA INC.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="io.vov.vitamio"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGAoWEhQKDmlvLnZvdi52aXRhbWlvEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  !!IMPORTANT!!<br>DON'T install or update this unless other apps let you install it. This is a library which won't work by itself.<p>This APK is for devices which support NEON.</p><p><br>What's Vitamio</p><p>Vitamio is a multimedia framework for all Android devices. Vitamio works like the Android's default MediaPlayer except that it includes much more powerful features. And it's absolutely free !</p><p><br>Network Protocols</p><p>The following network protocols are supported for audio and video playback:</p><p>    MMS<br>    RTSP (RTP, SDP)<br>    HTTP progressive streaming<br>    HTTP live streaming (M3U8), for Android 2.1+</p><p><br>Media formats</p><p>Many audio and video codecs are packed into Vitamio beside the default media format built in Android platform, some of them are listed below.</p><p>    divx/xvid<br>    wmv<br>    flv<br>    ts<br>    rmvb<br>    mkv<br>    mov<br>    m4v<br>    avi<br>    mp4<br>    3gp</p><p></p><p>Subtitles</p><p>Vitamio support the display of many external and embedded subtitle formats.</p><p>    SubRip(.srt)<br>    Sub Station Alpha(.ssa) / Advanced Sub Station Alpha(.ass)<br>    SAMI(.smi/.sami)<br>    MicroDVD(.sub/.txt)<br>    SubViewer2.0(.sub)<br>    MPL2(.mpl/.txt)<br>    Matroska (.mkv) Subtitle Track</p><p></p><p>More features</p><p>There are more wonderful features available in Vitamio.</p><p>    Background playback<br>    Multiple audio tracks support<br>    Mutitiple subtitles support, including external and embedded ones<br>    Processor optimization for many platforms<br>    Buffering when streaming<br>    Adjustable aspect ratio<br>    Automatically text encoding detection</p><p>And many other features are waiting for you !</p><p><br>How to use Vitamio</p><p>Please refer our website at http://vitamio.org</p><p>Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any problems.</p><p></p><p>Privacy</p><p>We must notify you that Vitamio will collect those information to improve itself when you using it.<br>UniqueID generated from Device identifier</p><p>Vitamio reads your device identifier to generate an unique ID and collect the generated one instead of your device identifier. Most important, this generation can't be reversed. So don't worry about this, as it's not harmful.<br>Device's CPU features and screen size.</p><p>Vitamio will work on many different Android devices, different CPU architectures, different screen sizes and so on, so it needs to know the environment.<br>The app's package name which is using Vitamio</p><p>There're many apps which may use Vitamio, so Vitamio should know which process is using it to allocate proper resources.</p><p></p><p>Licenses</p><p>Vitamio uses sevral opensource projects, thanks to them.<br>FFmpeg, universalchardet</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 可適用於iOS手機或平板裝置，直覺式的介面能讓使用者快速且簡易的設定、使用一台或多台AiCam。只要幾個步驟，就能看到即時影像、轉換不同AiCam畫面、擷取即時影像，影片或遠端控制內鍵的喇叭麥克風做雙向通話。<br>           AiCam app還可以簡易地操作動作及聲響偵測，一偵測到聲響或動作隨即啟動警示，並即時儲存影像、發送推播通知，讓使用者馬上就能掌握狀況。動作偵測亦可選擇在特定的區域內做偵測，降低錯誤偵測的機率。<br>AiCam的使用者還可將影像安全地儲存在ASUS WebStorage雲端空間上。這項服務目前提供免費保留過去七天之內的影像紀錄與儲存。或是使用者可以連接上支援ASUS AiCloud功能的路由器，AiCam app就可以不中斷地記錄影像至連接的USB儲存裝置，讓使用者隨心所欲地擴充儲存空間。<br>           AiCam也內建光線感測器，當偵測到環境變暗時就會自動啟動紅外線夜視功能，因此無論白天或夜晚，都能維持高畫質影像品質。AiCam提供縮時攝影功能，可將長時間的事件變化，錄製成一段短片。 <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a From setup to parental control, Tether provides a simple, intuitive user interface to see what the status of your router is, who’s online and what their privileges are.<br>- Setup SSID, password and Internet settings of your router<br>- Block unauthorized users who are accessing your router<br>- Manage permissions of client devices<br>- Parental control function with schedule and URL-based Internet access management<p>★ Compatible Routers/DSL Routers<br>Archer C9 /Archer C8 <br>Archer C7 /Archer C5<br>Archer C2/Archer C20/Archer C20i<br>TL-WDR4300/TL-WDR3600/TL-WDR3500<br>TL-WR1043ND V3.0<br>TL-WR841N/TL-WR841ND<br>TL-WR741ND/TL-WR740N V5.0<br>Archer D20/Archer D2/Archer D7/Archer D9<br>More routers supported by Tether are coming soon!</p><p>★ Important Notes <br>● Upgrade firmware is required. Go to the download page to choose the correct version and download the latest firmware: http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/<br>● TP-LINK Tether does not work when connected to guest network<br>● TP-LINK Tether currently does not work with range extender<br>● Android version supported: Android 2.3.3 and above<br>● For any issue, please contact support@tp-link.com</p><p>● Setting up your Router with Tether<br>Straight out of the box, use Tether to set up your new TP-LINK router listed in the compatible products list above. Setup SSID, password and Internet settings to get online in no time!<br>● Live Network Management Access with Tether<br>Tether will give you an overview of who is connected to the router and let you see someone who shouldn’t be there? Tether lets you block them from your network at the touch of a button. Say goodbye to Wi-Fi thieving neighbors!<br>● Managing Administrators and online behaviors with Tether<br>Tether helps you with designating which of your devices or users gets to control the router and setting the permission that comes with it. With URL-based “white list”, you can choose for websites&nbsp;which are safe to visit (in doing so, access is only given to websites in the list), and meanwhile control and limit access to the network to certain time of the day for your children’s devices. So bed time means bed time!</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.tplink.tether" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> Market Helper  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=JRummy+Apps+Inc." title="JRummy Apps Inc.">JRummy Apps Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.jrummy.apps.google.play.api"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5qcnVtbXkuYXBwcy5nb29nbGUucGxheS5hcGkQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This app is an add-on for apps created by JRummy Apps Inc. The app does not put an app icon in your app drawer. Please read the description below:<p>This app only has one purpose - it uses the unofficial android market api to get info about other apps that are on the Google Play Store. It can get info about an app's description, category, price, etc. on the Google Play Store. The info is used in other apps (like ROM Toolbox or Ultimate Backup) to create app groups or show you additional information about one of your installed apps.</p><p>The reason this is a separate app is because of the permissions it requires. This app is open source, which means you can know exactly what the app does. The permissions to your accounts is only used to generate a token used in the Android Market API. This is explained here: http://code.google.com/p/android-market-api/wiki/WithAndroid</p><p>We didn't want to just add those permissions to the main app. This same API is used by apps like Titanium Backup. We just made this a separate app so users won't complain so much about a permission being added :P</p><p>If you have any additional questions please feel free to contact us at ActiBook是可以把紙本訊息輕鬆發布在Android系统的智慧型手機和平板電腦上，方便攜帶閱讀的程式。<p>現在很多企業已經將印刷品轉換成ActiBook格式公開電子書,舉凡宣傳型錄、銷售資料、操作手册和免費雜誌等。下載程式的用戶可以選擇感興趣的免費書本，或者透過輸入ID/PASS才可閱讀的書本。</p><p>※※行動裝置確認※※<br>■Phone<br>・ARROWS X LTE SOL23</p><p>■Tablet<br>・GALAXY Tab 7.0 Plus SC-02D<br>・GALAXY Tab 10.1 LTE SC-01D<br>・Sony Tablet S<br>・Google Nexus7<br>・Google Nexus10<br>・Google Nexus7(2013)</p><p>■使用指南■ <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="org.oshc.chemicalsafetydatabase"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH29yZy5vc2hjLmNoZW1pY2Fsc2FmZXR5ZGF0YWJhc2UQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span 由職業安全健康局屬下的化學品安全及健康諮詢委員會製作的『化學品安全資料庫』應用程式，其內容主要是參考《危險品條例》、勞工處出版的『工業常用危險化學品分類及標籤』、『工作環境內化學品的職業衛生標準』及相關的化學安全指引。<p>This "Chemical Safety Database" App, produced by the Chemical Safety and Health Advisory Committee under the Occupational Safety and Health Council (OSHC), is based on “Dangerous Goods Ordinance”, Labour Department’s reference booklet “Classification and Labelling of Dangerous Substances Commonly Used in Industry”, “A Reference Note on Occupational Exposure Limits for Chemical Substances in the Work Environment” and related chemical safety guidance notes.</p> <span class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=decemberpei.gmail.pptcontroller" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=decemberpei.gmail.pptcontroller" title="Ppt Remote Controller"> 51.    Ppt Remote Controller  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=decemberpei" title="decemberpei">decemberpei</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="decemberpei.gmail.pptcontroller"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2RlY2VtYmVycGVpLmdtYWlsLnBwdGNvbnRyb2xsZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  1. What is PptRemoteController :<p>PptRemoteController is a software tool, with which user could use his smart phone control the playing of Power Point Slide Shows on his laptop.<br>----------------------------<br>2. How to use :</p><p>a. Get and install the essential software<br>  On your Android smart phone, install the PptRemoteController application from google play. After installation, the icon should appear in your application list.<br>  On your laptop, click https://github.com/decemberpei/pptcontroller/blob/master/installer.zip?raw=true  to download the installer, After download, decompress the downloaded .zip file to a folder,then run the Installer.exe and install. The program will auto start after install finish.</p><p>b. Control laptop’s PPT Slide Shows using smart phone<br>  On your smart phone, Click to run PptRemoteController in application list. The tip on the screen will ask you to connect your laptop to a specified wifi hotspot(such as PptRemoteController - 7919);<br>  On your laptop, Connect to the wifi hotspot mentioned above(single click the wifi signal icon on windows system bar, then choose the corresponding wifi hotspot name in the pop up list)</p><p>c. After connection established, The smart phone will come to below screen.<br>  Open the target PPT document on your laptop if it’s not yet open. Then try sliding the screen of your smart phone, the PPT should start playing, subsequent slidings would trigger the PPT switch to next/previous page. Note that Volume keys are also capable for switching between pages, even when smart phone’s screen is off.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=decemberpei.gmail.pptcontroller" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 66.97143077850342%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="decemberpei.gmail.pptcontroller"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2RlY2VtYmVycGVpLmdtYWlsLnBwdGNvbnRyb2xsZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> IVONA for Android replaces the synthesized text-to-speech (TTS) voices currently available on your Android device with more natural sounding, accurate &amp; easy-to-understand voices. Select from 13 different languages to find the one best suited for you. Easy to install one or several different voices!</p><p>IVONA is compatible with many of your favorite Android applications. href="/store/apps/details?id=com.samj.CardTest" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.samj.CardTest" title="CardTest"> 60.    CardTest  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Bitropy" title="Bitropy">Bitropy</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.samj.CardTest"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS5zYW1qLkNhcmRUZXN0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Out of curiousity I created this demo application to see how much data NFC enabled credit cards give up to a random reader.   It turns out they give you pretty much everything you see on the front of the card.<br>Despite some news reports proclaiming NFC credit cards can be read by passing strangers, in my experience the card has to be in close contact with the back of the phone to get a good read.<br>Out of paranoia, this app censors credit card info and the content of "track 2 equivalent data" as I would hate to release something that could be used for evil.<br>This app has only been tested on UK cards, with a Galaxy Nexus so may not work on other credit cards.  The app does not save or transmit any of the read data, but you use it at your own risk. <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.samj.CardTest" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a class="current-rating" style="width: 67.69230842590332%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag    Vitamio Plugin ARMv7  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=YIXIA+INC." title="YIXIA INC.">YIXIA INC.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="io.vov.vitamio.v7vfpv3"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmlvLnZvdi52aXRhbWlvLnY3dmZwdjMQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  !!IMPORTANT!!<br>DON'T install or update this unless other apps let you install it. This is a library which won't work by itself.<p>This APK is for ARMv7 devices, such as Tegra 2 devices.</p><p><br>What's Vitamio</p><p>Vitamio is a multimedia framework for all Android devices. Vitamio works like the Android's default MediaPlayer except that it includes much more powerful features. And it's absolutely free !</p><p><br>Network Protocols</p><p>The following network protocols are supported for audio and video playback:</p><p>    MMS<br>    RTSP (RTP, SDP)<br>    HTTP progressive streaming<br>    HTTP live streaming (M3U8), for Android 2.1+</p><p><br>Media formats</p><p>Many audio and video codecs are packed into Vitamio beside the default media format built in Android platform, some of them are listed below.</p><p>    divx/xvid<br>    wmv<br>    flv<br>    ts<br>    rmvb<br>    mkv<br>    mov<br>    m4v<br>    avi<br>    mp4<br>    3gp</p><p></p><p>Subtitles</p><p>Vitamio support the display of many external and embedded subtitle formats.</p><p>    SubRip(.srt)<br>    Sub Station Alpha(.ssa) / Advanced Sub Station Alpha(.ass)<br>    SAMI(.smi/.sami)<br>    MicroDVD(.sub/.txt)<br>    SubViewer2.0(.sub)<br>    MPL2(.mpl/.txt)<br>    Matroska (.mkv) Subtitle Track</p><p></p><p>More features</p><p>There are more wonderful features available in Vitamio.</p><p>    Background playback<br>    Multiple audio tracks support<br>    Mutitiple subtitles support, including external and embedded ones<br>    Processor optimization for many platforms<br>    Buffering when streaming<br>    Adjustable aspect ratio<br>    Automatically text encoding detection</p><p>And many other features are waiting for you !</p><p><br>How to use Vitamio</p><p>Please refer our website at http://vitamio.org</p><p>Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any problems.</p><p></p><p>Privacy</p><p>We must notify you that Vitamio will collect those information to improve itself when you using it.<br>UniqueID generated from Device identifier</p><p>Vitamio reads your device identifier to generate an unique ID and collect the generated one instead of your device identifier. Most important, this generation can't be reversed. So don't worry about this, as it's not harmful.<br>Device's CPU features and screen size.</p><p>Vitamio will work on many different Android devices, different CPU architectures, different screen sizes and so on, so it needs to know the environment.<br>The app's package name which is using Vitamio</p><p>There're many apps which may use Vitamio, so Vitamio should know which process is using it to allocate proper resources.</p><p></p><p>Licenses</p><p>Vitamio uses sevral opensource projects, thanks to them.<br>FFmpeg, universalchardet</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFm9yZy5vcGVuY3YuZXllbG9jdmFza28QARgD" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.opencv.eyelocvasko" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Eye Localization" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh3.ggpht.com/xiOyDC35HUZcvS_6Px5Qaxlx1SZcJ9cnRtkTvKHuTa8Jqa8Kf54l8FxexjLuhMkN6oAY=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh3.ggpht.com/xiOyDC35HUZcvS_6Px5Qaxlx1SZcJ9cnRtkTvKHuTa8Jqa8Kf54l8FxexjLuhMkN6oAY=w170-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.opencv.eyelocvasko" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">  <span class="movies preordered-overlay-container id-preordered-overlay-container" style="display:none"> <span class="preordered-label">已預購</span> </span> <span class="preview-overlay-container" data-docid="org.opencv.eyelocvasko">  </span>  </a>  </div> <div class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.opencv.eyelocvasko" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.opencv.eyelocvasko" title="Eye Localization"> 83.    Eye Localization  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Evangelos+Skodras" title="Evangelos Skodras">Evangelos Skodras</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="org.opencv.eyelocvasko"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFm9yZy5vcGVuY3YuZXllbG9jdmFza28QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The goal of the Eye Loc application is to localize the eye centers of a person the camera is capturing, in real time. It is based on a computer vision algorithm that exploits the chrominance information of the eye and the radial symmetry of the iris in order to localize the eye centers. The algorithm makes use of OpenCV, an open source computer vision and machine learning software library. Face detection is performed using the OpenCV’s built-in face detector. The application works optimally in well-illuminated environments, where images with good contrast levels are captured.  If you have any questions, or found a bug, please send an email to the address below.<p><br>APPLICATION AREAS</p><p>The Eye Loc application is released to demonstrate the eye localization functionality in handheld devices. Its development was initiated as part of a project to develop a robust eye localization platform based on low cost hardware, with the ambition to integrate its functionality in other applications such as: </p><p>• Eye typing<br>The eye typing feature uses the direction of the gaze and eye blinks to compose messages or perform other actions. The ultimate goal is to assist people with ALS, lock-in syndrome, tetraplegia or any other person that can only move their eyes with using their handheld device to communicate, browse the Internet or facilitate other everyday tasks.</p><p>• Smart scrolling <br>Similar to Samsung’s Smart Scroll feature which currently relies on face recognition and tilt (http://mashable.com/2013/03/14/smart-scroll/), smart scrolling can be further optimized by sensing the change of the direction of the gaze.</p><p>• Spoof proof face unlock<br>The face unlock feature can be usually spoofed using a photo of the owner (http://www.geek.com/android/android-face-lock-feature-spoofed-by-photograph-1440953/). Face unlock can be rendered more reliable by introducing a ‘liveness check’: once a face is verified, the user is required to follow a randomly moving dot with his eyes.</p><p>• Estimation of gaze direction for driver assistance<br>By mounting the mobile phone on a vehicle’s dashboard, a gaze estimation application could monitor and evaluate the driver’s vigilance, by determining whether the driver’s focus of attention is on the road.</p><p>• Usability evaluations<br>Eye movements and fixations provide an indication of the amount of cognitive processing a display requires and hence how easy it is to process, which leads to the potential use of eye tracking to contribute towards the assessment of the usability of user interfaces.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.opencv.eyelocvasko" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=org.opencv.eyelocvasko" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.1 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 81.43791198730469%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span QR scanning app.</p><p>Features:<br>* Barcode types: PDF417 (2D Barcode), QR code, Coder39, Code128<br>* Flexibility: easy to integrate API<br>* Working conditions: low and poor light conditions<br>* unicode</p><p>PDF417.mobi scanning library is ideal for different barcode reader apps like: boarding pass, personal identifications, payment slips, driver licences and other.</p><p>If you like it, <div class="description">  Project which offers an action to pick a bluetooth device. <br>Exposes the action PICK_BLUETOOTH_DEVICE to start the BluetoothDeviceListActivity which scans for Bluetooth Devices, shows them in a ListActivity and returns device info when a device is selected by the user.<br>This is done to deduplicate code between APPs - the code is graduated from the DUBwise Project and used in the upcomming DUBwise for UAVTalk APP. <br>The APP uses the lib tracedroid to be able to send debug logs when problems arise and android-bluetooth ( http://android-bluetooth.googlecode.com ) to be able to work with Android &lt;2.0 which has no native Bluetooth-API<br>The code is GPLv3 <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Sprint and AT&amp;T have removed FoxFi from Android Play Store. So if you could not find FoxFi in Play Store then please install or upgrade FoxFi from http://foxfi.com/bin, or scan the QR code in the third screenshot.</p><p>This version of FoxFi AddOn implements  <br> 1. Each of 14 apps can record your voice, speech and call  anytime they want. Most of these apps has internet permission and can transfer your records to the world.” –</p><p><br>• Try Mic Block - Anti spy &amp; malware and:</p><p>✔ Block and disable your microphone by single click.<br>✔ Protect your privacy from being recording and eavesdropping through phone.<br>✔ Use “Spy app catcher” feature to analyze if you are not already spied or recorded. (By spyware, malware, backdoor, surveillance or virus apps).<br>✔ Show list of apps with “record audio” - microphone permission (See security threats: spyware, virus, malware, backdoor and surveillance threats)<br>✔ Blocking and protection of all “call / audio / speech / voice recorder” type of application<br>✔ Use home screen widget for quick access.<br>✔ Simple and clear design with 2 templates and multiple icon sets.</p><p><br>• Spy app catcher  <br>Special feature that helps you to analyze and catch application that may be recording and spying you. When telephone is in stand by mode application is every few minutes testing open microphone (recording) attempts and may find spyware and malware applications.</p><p><br>★ Buy PRO version and support indy developers (Mic Block - Call and speech privacy): <br>- PRO protection is working 24h/7 ( Free version is turned off between  18:00 – 22:00 hour)<br>- PRO version has no ads.<br>http://goo.gl/P1znC9</p><p><br>• FAQ:</p><p>- Why application requires “record audio” (microphone) permission?</p><p>„Spy app catcher“ feature requires access to microphone to execute security test.<br>Microphone protection can't be technically done without direct access to microphone. (In simple terms: We can't close or block doors if we can't touch or manipulate these doors)</p><p><br>- Can application secure / protect from spying by security agencies ?</p><p>Application can secure and protect your android phone from listening and recording you by other applications that are infected by spyware, malware, virus or security agencies spying code, but can’t protect you from recording your calls going through “telephone line”. App can’t secure “telephone lines” so once your voice leave the phone we are not protecting you anymore. (If security agency decide to record your calls on the “telephone line” or “operator” we are not able to protect you).</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  NenaMark2 is an OpenGL|ES 2.0 benchmark for high-end mobile devices, continuing where the popular NenaMark1 left off with more advanced graphical effects and higher resolution graphics. <p>Unlike many other benchmarks, NenaMark measures performance using realistic scenes that could be taken from a typical game and presents the result in frames per second, i.e. providing an intuitive performance number that can be used for realistic comparisons between different devices.</p><p>Benchmark results from a wide variety of devices are available on the NenaMark site (http://nena.se/nenamark). </p><p>Effects:<br>- Skeletal Animation (bones matrix animation), trees.<br>- Morph Target Animation (blend vertex sets), sun flowers along house wall.<br>- Bump Mapping (using normal map), stone walls on house.<br>- Water (reflections, normal animation, fresnel effect), the lake.<br>- Cloud System (advanced particle system), clouds.<br>- Cube Map Reflections (w/ dynamic cube map generation), windows on house.<br>- Smoke (advanced particle system), smoke from chimney.<br>- Shadow Mapping (dynamic shadow mapping), terrain.<br>- Texture Channel Animation, sparkling sun.<br>- Smooth Gradient Animation, sky hemisphere.<br>- Dynamic lighting (per vertex diffuse lighting), entire scene.<br>- Lens flare, lens flare from sun at low altitude.</p><p>For more information, visit: http://nena.se/nenamark</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.shiitakeo.android_wear_for_ios" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.shiitakeo.android_wear_for_ios" title="android wear for ios/iPhone"> 122.    android wear for ios/iPhone  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=shiitakeo" title="shiitakeo">shiitakeo</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.shiitakeo.android_wear_for_ios"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImNvbS5zaGlpdGFrZW8uYW5kcm9pZF93ZWFyX2Zvcl9pb3MQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Android Wear でiPhoneの通知を受け取れるようにするアプリです．<br>iPhone側の脱獄は必要ありません．<p>- 準備<br>チュートリアルビデオがYoutubeにあります．<br>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-hUKFGMJdIk&amp;feature=youtu.be</p><p>1. BLE UtilityというアプリをAppStoreからiPhoneにインストールします<br>2. Peripheralタブをクリックします．新しいPeripheralは追加しなくて良いです．<br>3. Android Wear上で本アプリを起動します．<br>4. iPhone上でBLE Utilityもしくはandroid wear utilityを起動し，Blinkの横のボタンをオンにします．<br>5. 10秒くらいするとPINコードが表示されるので，ペアリングを実行してください．<br>6. Success というアニメーションが実行されれば成功です．<br>7. ここでスワイプしてはいけません．時計の横のボタン（Crown）を押すか，10秒位まってWatch faceに戻ってください．<br>※うまくいかない場合（Stopptedや，雲のアイコンが出たら失敗です．アプリを再起動する，Bluetoothをオフ/オンする，Bluetoothペアリングを解除するなどでリセットしてください．）<br>8. "music"という通知をタップすると，iPhoneの音楽アプリを操作できる画面が立ち上がります．音量，曲送り，一時停止，タイトルの確認ができます．<br>9. もし，root取得済みのAndroid wearを利用している場合は，正しい日時が自動的に設定されます．</p><p><br>- できること<br>iPhoneの通知を受信する<br>特定のアプリはアプリアイコンを表示する（PlayStore版では削除しています．github版をご利用ください）<br>電話がかかってきた時にAccept/Declineボタンで出る/出ないが操作できる．<br>通知が来るとスクリーンが勝手にオンになって1秒くらいしてまたオフになる．<br>通知をスワイプして消すと，7秒くらいしてiPhone上の通知も消える<br>Declineボタンを押して消すと，すぐにiPhone上の通知が消える<br>自動再接続機能(デモ： https://youtu.be/RBMk48m_NrU)<br>音楽操作<br>時刻設定（root端末のみ）<br>- 動作確認端末<br>以下のページを参考にしてください．<br>moto360以外は安定して動作します．G Watch Rがおすすめです．<br>https://github.com/shiitakeo/android_wear_for_ios</p><p>- サポートコミュニティ<br>私のTwitterです．<br>https://twitter.com/shiitakeo</p><p>xdaにスレッドがあります．<br>http://forum.xda-developers.com/android-wear/development/android-wear-ios-connectivity-t3052524</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ocv.objectdetect" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ocv.objectdetect" title="OpenCV Movement Detect"> 128.    OpenCV Movement Detect  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=winterhanda" title="winterhanda">winterhanda</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.ocv.objectdetect"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5vY3Yub2JqZWN0ZGV0ZWN0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  CODE HERE: https://github.com/projektlp/Android_OCV_Movement_Detection<p><br>This app uses the BackgroundSubtractorMOG algorithm from OpenCV's android library to identify objects in motion from the camera and draws a red overlay around/over them. The ideal is to have nice contours drawn around the objects that are moving. A slider is also added for the user to adjust the learning rate, which may or may not have any effect on the contours.</p><p>In order to utilize the app, the latest version of OpenCV Manager (also found on Google Play) must be downloaded and installed correctly. This app has been successfully tested on Android 2.3.4 and Android 4.3. </p><p>At the moment this can considered an initial tech demo, please feel free to play around with it. The source code for this implementation can also be found in github link below!</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=biz.buelter.viewr" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=biz.buelter.viewr" title="ViewR"> 130.    ViewR  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Torben+B%C3%BClter" title="Torben Bülter">Torben Bülter</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="biz.buelter.viewr"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWJpei5idWVsdGVyLnZpZXdyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ViewR is a voice controlled demo application that basically mixes a side by side view <br>for head mounted display solutions like Dive or others with Qualcomm's Augmented Reality SDK Vuforia.<br>Despite it's limited functionality, ViewR gives a slight impression of how it could feel to be robo cop :)<p>Code: https://github.com/TorbVR/ViewR-simple</p><p>Key Functionality<br>- Side by Side view in "binocular style" (a tiny bit like Oculus Rift)<br>- Use voice commands to control the app<br>- Apply different shaders for various image effects (for instance inverted colors, old film, etc.)<br>- Shows information in the right upper corner of the display (target information and data from gyro)<br>- Recognizes predefined targets that will expose 3D models and also play videos <br>- Manage camera functions: flash and continuous autofocus<br>- Take screenshots<br>- Walkera QR W100S FPV (slow)<br>- Virtual Compass</p><p>Targets<br>- "smart watch" target will show an augmented and interactive menu<br>- "ARena" target will expose a controllable robot (only tested with PS3 Controller)<br>- MTG trading card target will show a 3D bird (http://magiccards.info/scans/en/m12/165.jpg)<br>- (photographed) poster targets will play movie trailers and an interview  (http://www.buelter.biz/viewr/targets)<br>- other poster targets will show a sword, a shield and a not yet animated zombie<br>- background of my not yet ready website will play a short ad (http://bit.ly/1aefcA0)</p><p><br>Instructions<br>- Make targets available (either on screen or printed)<br>- Press ok and put on your HMD<br>- Look at target to execute an action<br>- Tap screen to apply another shader to the video background<br>- Double tap to access options menu<br>- Press back button to view about screen (twice to quit)<br>- Whistle/snap/clap to activate voice commands (if it works, you will hear a sound)<br>- Use "next" and "back" to switch between shaders<br>- "flash on" and "flash off" to toggle camera flash<br>- "autofocus on" and "autofocus off" to toggle continuous autofocus<br>- "focus" to immediately autofocus<br>- "screenshot", to save a screenshot to /sdcard/Android/data/biz.buelter.viewr/files<br>- "menu" to access options menu and "close" to close it again<br>- "launcher", starts the divegames launcher, if you have installed it<br>- "drone" and "camera" to switch between camera and Walkera QR W100S FPV (make sure you're connected to it)<br>- "compass on" and "compass off" to toggle compass,<br>- "exit" to terminate</p><p>Known issues<br>- Seems not to work on GT-S5301L (got a crash report)<br>- FPV for Walkera QR W100s works slow <br>- Speech recognition will only work with Android &gt;= 4.03<br>- Runs slow on old devices<br>- Positioning of targets in the scene does not work as well as in other vuforia apps <br>- Some shaders are far from perfect as I didn't want to go to deep into shader programming </p><p>Planned future features<br>- Proper video recording<br>- Target positioning like other Vuforia apps<br>- better latency and controls for Walkera FPV</p><p>Version 1.11 was tested on S4 with KitKat (works) and on S1 with ICS (very slow, voice control doesn't work) but technically voice recognition should work on all devices with Android &gt;= 4.03</p><p>Thank-You-List:<br>My buddy Nils Frenking (nfrenking@gmail.com), who helped a little with coding/inspiration here and there,<br>Eyedak for sending me a prototype of vrAse and<br>Shoogee for deploying the Durovis Dive so early, making it's "twin brother" open source</p><p>ViewR will not make use or even send any of your data anywhere (just in case you thought of it:))</p><p>Please keep in mind that this is experimental software which is published as a demo and feel free to contact me anytime for whatever reason:)</p><p>info@buelter.biz<br>https://twitter.com/TorbVR<br>https://www.facebook.com/torb23</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span professional fishermen alike,to find out the location of fish,depth and bottom contour of water.This WIFI fish finder can be used in ocean,river or lake and is fantastic for detecting schools of fish in any fresh water or salt water.This WIFI Fish Finder is based on Sonar technology,The WIFI transducer sends a sound wave signal ,the returned “echoes” are transmitted with WIFI technology to the IPHONE ,IPAD or other intelligent device ,then all the underwater information is displayed on the screen,including the water depth,water temperature,bottom contour,fish location and depth. <span L. by Roman Nurik<br>* "Android-Validator" by Benjamin Besse<br>* "Universal-Image-Loader" by Gökhan Akkurt<br>* "PinEntry" by webile-android<br>* "UrlImageViewHelper" by Koushik Dutta<br>* class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.tecit.android.bluescanner.demo" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.tecit.android.bluescanner.demo" title="无线条码扫描器演示"> 135.    无线条码扫描器演示  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TEC-IT" title="TEC-IT">TEC-IT</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tecit.android.bluescanner.demo"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImNvbS50ZWNpdC5hbmRyb2lkLmJsdWVzY2FubmVyLmRlbW8QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  用你的智能手机就像一个无线条码阅读器和远程扫描条形码。条形码可以立即通过蓝牙,TCP/IP或WebSocket接口进一步处理。<p>该应用程序是完全适合作为节约成本的替代手持式无线条码成像仪;它会迅速且可靠地扫描常见的线性和二维条形码. 这个免费模拟带有演示文本随机地取代条码数据. 所有其他功能等同于完整版. 所有其他功能等同于完整版(请见 market://details?id=com.tecit.android.bluescanner.full). </p><p>容易: 无线条码扫描器是很容易安装，配置和使用. 你只需要启动应用程序，或对您的计算机连接器和远程扫描条形码。就可以了。</p><p>快速: 条形码检测并迅速解码.</p><p>批量扫描: 扫描条形码逐个或以批处理方式.</p><p>测井: 扫描条形码记录供以后（重新）发送。日志的大小是可调的。<br>蓝牙, TCP/IP, WEBSOCKET: 无线条码扫描器通过蓝牙TCP/IP 或 WebSocket通信.<br>蓝牙: 该应用程序可以作为支持串行端口配置文件 (蓝牙SPP)的蓝牙主进行操作. 一旦搭配电脑，条码数据可以从一个虚拟串口（RS232或COM口），用标准的软件工具读取.<br>无线条码扫描器还可以配置为（通过WiFi或移动网络），通过TCP/ IP发送条码到目标系统中。该应用实现了TCP服务器，任何TCP客户端（例如，TELNET）可被用作接收器. </p><p>最后，无线条码扫描器可以操作的WebSocket的服务器。合适的制作的HTML5网页可以很容易地与应用程序进行通信.</p><p>条码控件：无线条码扫描器提供了可调的条形码支持，前缀和后缀的配置和条码解码可调的字符集。<br>KEYBOARD WEDGE: 为了注射收集条形码作为模拟按键，一个像TEC-IT的产品TWedge键盘楔软件是必需的.免费试玩下载可在www.tec-it.com.<br>批量许可: 完整版本可在谷歌Play商店下载(请见market://details?id=com.tecit.android.bluescanner.full). 批量或企业许可 (无需一个谷歌Play帐户) 请与sales@tec-it.com 联系. </p><p>##请您的反馈##<br>TEC-IT赞赏用户的产品反馈，并增强请求. 请通过电子邮件与我们support@tec-it.com联系.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.darkrealmgaming.androidsudo" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.darkrealmgaming.androidsudo" title="Sudo for Android   ★root"> 148.    Sudo for Android   ★root  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Dark+Realm+Gaming" title="Dark Realm Gaming">Dark Realm Gaming</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.darkrealmgaming.androidsudo"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5kYXJrcmVhbG1nYW1pbmcuYW5kcm9pZHN1ZG8QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This app requires root!<p>This app WILL NOT give you root! It installs a sudo script to your system so you can have a more desktop style approach at using root in adb shell and Terminal Emulator.</p><p>Have an issue? Contact me via email and I will try to fix it! colton(at)darkrealmgaming(dot)com</p><p>This will install a sudo script to your /system/</p><p>Some devices do not support the normal install mode because they have kernel write protection. Version 2.0+ have a special recovery install mode that can work around this issue on such devices.</p><p>Learn more: https://darkrealmgaming.com/about/androidsudo/</p><p>We're open source! Check it out on GitHub: https://github.com/ColtonDRG/AndroidSudo/</p><p>Not a Google Play user? Download the APK directly from DRGdl: https://dl.darkrealmgaming.com/development/sudoinstaller/latest.php</p><p>Running Android 2.x? Use version 2.1.0: https://dl.darkrealmgaming.com/development/sudoinstaller/androidsudo-210.apk</p><p>Why would you want this?<br>1. For any power user who uses Linux or Mac OS X on their computer, you will know the sudo command and you may often type sudo instead of su -c, out of habit, in adb shell or Terminal Emulator. This will let you use sudo like you would on your PC.<br>2. Some of my other apps rely on this because Android is kinda difficult to use root commands in code. This makes it much easier since you don't have to deal with quotes like you do with the old fashioned su -c command.</p><p>This app makes modifications to your system ROM. We take no responsibility if you brick your device or mess up your system!</p><p>If you decide you want to undo this, or you need to remove it for any other reason, you can do so at any time by opening the app and clicking remove!</p><p>After installing, you can remove the app and keep sudo, but you will need to reinstall the app to remove sudo.</p><p><br>No data is collected directly from the app, however, some data may be gathered and shared with us for crash and bug reports by Google Play according to Google's privacy policy.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.xxmassdeveloper.mpchartexample" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.xxmassdeveloper.mpchartexample" title="MPAndroidChart Example"> 156.    MPAndroidChart Example  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=X.X_Mass_Developer" title="X.X_Mass_Developer">X.X_Mass_Developer</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.xxmassdeveloper.mpchartexample"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImNvbS54eG1hc3NkZXZlbG9wZXIubXBjaGFydGV4YW1wbGUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This is the example application for the MPAndroidChart chart library / graph library on GitHub: https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart<p>It is designed to create beautiful visual representations.</p><p>The core features of the library include:</p><p>- Compatible with Android 2.2 (API level 8) and upwards<br>- 7 different chart types: line, bar, pie, scatter, bubble, candlestick, radar (spider web)<br>- Combined Charts<br>- Scaling on both axes (with touch-gesture, axes separately or pinch-zoom)<br>- Dual (separate) Y-Axis<br>- Dragging / Panning (with touch-gesture)<br>- Finger drawing (draw values into the chart with touch-gesture)<br>- Highlighting values (with customizeable popup-views)<br>- Save chart to SD-Card (as image, or as .txt file)<br>- Read .txt file chart-data<br>- Predefined color templates<br>- Legends (generated automatically, customizeable)<br>- Animations<br>- Limit lines<br>- Fully customizeable (paints, typefaces, legends, colors, background, gestures, dashed lines, ...)</p><p>This project is meant to demonstrate the features of the library and motivate developers to make use of it.</p><p><br>Recent changes / improvements (app version):</p><p>2.1.0<br> - New chart type: BubbleChart<br> - Fixed issue concerning elevation<br> - Fixed issue concerning jumping x-axis<br> - General bugfixes</p><p>2.0.9<br> - LimitLine for both XAxis and YAxis<br> - Inverted YAxis now working for all chart types<br> - Animation easing<br> - More styling options<br> - More viewport modification methods<br> - Bugfixes</p><p>2.0.8<br> - Major performance improvements<br> - Bugfixes</p><p>2.0.7<br> - Bugfixes<br> - Included JavaDoc</p><p>2.0.1<br> - Dual YAxis<br> - HorizontalBarChart<br> - CombinedChart<br> - Performance improvements<br> - Removed nineoldandroids library<br> - Removed v4 support library<br> - Bugfixes</p><p>1.7.4<br> - fixed memory leak issue<br> - fixed issue concerning clipping with Activity attribute screenSize | orientation<br> - improved PieChart and RadarChart offset calculation (with Legend)<br> - dragging and scaling can now be enabled/disabled separately<br> - radarchart fix<br> - more examples<br> - general bugfixes</p><p>1.6.5<br> - fixed issue concerning background color<br> - fixed issue concerning ScatterChart clipping<br> - fixed issue concerning zero values<br> - fixed empty PieChart crash</p><p>1.6.3<br> - improved dynamical data adding / removing<br> - fixed crash in example app<br> - general bugfixes</p><p>1.6.2<br> - more custom value formatting<br> - fixed scrolling and zooming issues on other scrollable surfaces (like ListView or ViewPager)<br> - general bugfixes<br> - fixed known issues</p><p>1.5.2<br> - entries and datasets can now be added and removed dynamically<br> - custom label and value formatting<br> - more generics<br> - fixed known issues<br> - bugfixes in the example</p><p>1.4.1<br> - new chart type: RadarChart (spider net chart)<br> - grouped BarChart (grouped DataSets)<br> - over-draw feature<br> - fixed known issues</p><p>1.3.3<br>- grouped barchart<br>- bugfixes</p><p>1.3.2<br>- cubic-line charts<br>- added support for API level 8<br>- bugfixes</p><p>1.3.1<br>- introducing candle-stick chart<br>- fixed known issues</p><p>1.2.2<br>- new data model improvements<br>- animations for all chart types<br>- limit lines<br>- fixed known issues</p><p>1.1.2<br>- introducing the new data model (different DataSet types for each chart type)<br>- legend improvements<br>- y-axis can now be inverted</p><p>1.0.8<br>- added chart in ListView example<br>- added multiple chart-types in ListView example</p><p>1.0.6<br>- listview in example<br>- fixed issue concerning saveToGallery(...)</p><p>1.0.5<br>- bugfix concerning centerViewPort(...) method<br>- piechart improvements (space between bars)<br>- piechart bugfix (highlighting)<br>- removed dead code</p><p>1.0.4<br>- The x- and y-axis labels can now be positioned anywhere around the chart<br>- Improvements in the legend<br>- Fixed known issues</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.w394aa0a22311a004a718516078be944d" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.w394aa0a22311a004a718516078be944d" title="理數合解"> 158.    理數合解  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E6%99%BA%E6%85%A7%E5%AF%B6%E5%BA%AB" title="智慧寶庫">智慧寶庫</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.w394aa0a22311a004a718516078be944d"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLwotEisKJWNvbS53Mzk0YWEwYTIyMzExYTAwNGE3MTg1MTYwNzhiZTk0NGQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  本書已升級至最新繁、簡體圖書版本，敬請改至下列網址免費下載~~<p>繁體版<br>https://play.google.com/store/books/details/%E6%99%BA%E6%85%A7%E5%AF%B6%E5%BA%AB_%E7%90%86%E6%95%B8%E5%90%88%E8%A7%A3_%E5%8C%97%E6%B5%B7%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA_%E7%8E%8B%E8%A6%BA%E4%B8%80%E7%A5%96%E5%B8%AB?id=0W2ABAAAQBAJ</p><p>簡體版<br>https://play.google.com/store/books/details/%E6%99%BA%E6%85%A7%E5%AF%B6%E5%BA%AB_%E7%90%86%E6%95%B0%E5%90%88%E8%A7%A3_%E5%8C%97%E6%B5%B7%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA_%E7%8E%8B%E8%A7%89%E4%B8%80%E7%A5%96%E5%B8%88?id=-W6ABAAAQBAJ</p><p><br>摘錄部份資訊，更多的資訊與版本(如簡體)，歡迎至「智慧寶庫」www. peace2.info 網站下載~~</p><p>理數合解   (北海老人)<br>序<br>竊思混沌未開，理無不在，鴻蒙甫辟，數無不周。理常而不變，數變而有常。故理曰定理，數曰定數，此固不必解，而亦無可解者也。況乎，執中精一，虞帝探理學之源，衍範敘疇箕子詳數學之目，前人之說備矣，將庸何解？然而不解袛待人之悟，何若有解以釋人之疑？故聖教無隱，性道亦示諸賢。至誠前知，因革可窮百世，是皆以解解之，並未以不解解之也。降及後世，注解愈繁。陸王之書詳於理，而略于數，陳邵之書，詳於數，而略於理，亦皆洞見本源，不差累黍。 然偏而不舉，滋弊益多。故後之學者，別戶分門，自相刺謬。言理者遁於寂滅之鄉，言數者流於讖緯之學，非盡學者之失，解亦未嘗合解，貽之咎也。識者憂之，甚欲索一編以救正之，而卒乏善本。爰搜北海老人生平所得，力以示人者，匯輯成編，分為四卷，知理之本於學庸也，故以學庸為先。知數之本于大易也，故三易探原又次之。知理不離數，數不離理，體用同歸，顯微一致也，故一貫探原又次之。凡以釋理性之疑也，故以理性釋疑終焉，是書也，非作于一時，不無重出疊見之弊。然慮之深，故言之複，見之切，故說之詳。此尤諄諄提命之苦衷，未可于尋常文法律之也。餘恐見是書者，不解其所以致此之由，或欲廢是解，而別求一解也。<br>是為序<br>光緒乙未孟冬竹坡居士書于修竹齋竹窗下<br>學庸序<br>學庸之解，何為而解也？蓋為論語言性，分性習而未剖理氣，故百餘年告子之徒出，而杞柳之性、湍水之性、及性惡之說興，而降衷之恒性昧矣！此乃論氣不論理，性體之所以不明也。是以孟子得孔門之正傳，起而救之以性善，是則是矣，然論理不論氣，而後起之情識未悉，故不達者，多以之為迂，理微難見，氣顯易知故也。迨至有宋濂洛諸儒輩出，補前賢之所未備，而性遂有本然氣質之別，理氣分清，較之前賢頗為詳盡，而又未嘗言及本然氣質二者，大本大源之所從來。其失意傳言，誦言忘味，志弋名利，無心聖賢者，固無足論，縱使有志，或於源頭未清，亦無從入手。論者不失於空言無憑，則失之以氣為理。賢關聖域淆然莫辨，人心道心混為一途，而精一執中之傳，已在若晦若明間矣。愚於是不揣固陋，因中庸之天性，大學之明德，闡明理天氣天，為理性氣性，人心道心之所自出，不令後之學者，生漫無入手，望洋而返之歎。斯解言理必本於河圖，驗之大地，即東西南、北不易之寒熱溫涼，推而至於性，分之四端萬善，使寂然不動，感而遂通之無極理天，燎然在目，再推無極之真，二五之精，妙合而凝，三五之體用費隱推，而至於河洛卦爻，理天氣天百王不易之大經大法，以實大人大體之用，則理周性命。人稟天理，天人一貫，賦畀稟受之際，鑿鑿可據，天與人合，人與天通，窮神達化，當前即是，不假強為。已入聖域，得其真傳，知所入手，盡性至命。雖理微道大，步步腳踏實地的，知不睹不聞、無聲無臭、體物不遺、洋洋如在者，到底為何事，即極深研幾，確有把柄，知聖賢心法，非漫漫無稽之空談，方知至靜不動之理。人得之為本然之性，降衷之性，性善之性，人生而靜之性，堯舜之不異眾人者也。若只言本然，不究氣質，雖無礙於明德率性之道，猶恐不足以惺未達者之心。故無極理天而後，又申明太極、陰陽、四象、八卦，三百六十五度四分度之一，一周之流行氣天。又複參之以星辰日月吉凶之性，以及旺相休咎生克制化，萬分不齊之所以然。天氣如何分之與人為氣數之命，人何以得氣天之所命者，為氣質之性，以究壽夭窮通智愚賢否之所由來，方使理常氣變，燎若指掌。聖域賢關，燦如列眉，使有志為學者，不致有南轅北轍，莫知適從之惑，得其大本大源之所在，了然性命天道之微。由約入博，必令窮究經史子集，考驗古今國家之興廢，人事之得失，以及元會升降，世運變遷，天地終始，人物消息之顯。洞悉費隱，明中之體，廓大之量，入手以靜，了手以誠，通達本末，盡人合天，而內聖外王，明德新民，修道立教之綱領條目，治平位育之極致功效，有不外此而得者矣，此學庸二經之所以解也。區區管窺，未知是否，如有高明，乞賜指教。<br>  <br>光緒二十一年陽月中浣之吉</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.w394aa0a22311a004a718516078be944d" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.w394aa0a22311a004a718516078be944d" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.0 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 80%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=alisovets.example.hellogooglemap" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=alisovets.example.hellogooglemap" title="Hello Map"> 159.    Hello Map  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Alexander+Lisovets" title="Alexander Lisovets">Alexander Lisovets</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="alisovets.example.hellogooglemap"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKgooEiYKIGFsaXNvdmV0cy5leGFtcGxlLmhlbGxvZ29vZ2xlbWFwEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Цей Helloworld проект розроблений з єдиною метою - дослідити використання основних можливостей сервісів місцезнаходження та  Google Map API.<br>Програма дозволяє визначити своє місцезнаходження та побачити його на мапі. Ви можете змінити тип мапи і додати маркери з описом місця. Ви можете передивлятись список місць, щоб вибрати одне та подивитись його на мапі.<br>Можна вибрати максимальну відстань і бачити на мапі лише міця, що знаходяться не далі цієї відстані від вашої теперішньої позиції.  <p>Вихідний код програми можна побачити: https://github.com/alisovets/AndroidHelloMap</p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" 溫馨聖誕音樂鈴聲  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Go+Ringtone" title="Go Ringtone">Go Ringtone</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.go.Ringtone.Last01"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5nby5SaW5ndG9uZS5MYXN0MDEQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  這個應用程序包含最流行,悅耳及溫馨的聖誕音樂鈴聲。<p>你可以設置你喜愛的音樂為默認鈴聲，某人的來電，信息和報警鈴聲等。</p><p>此程式添加了一個特殊功能，就是搜索手機所有的音樂作鈴聲，並把它們放到一個文件夾內，你可以自由選擇任何一首歌曲作為鈴聲。</p><p>如何操作:</p><p>- 按下並按住你想要的鈴聲，直到出現一個彈出菜單，選擇提供的選項。<br>- Vitamio Plugin ARMv6  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=YIXIA+INC." title="YIXIA INC.">YIXIA INC.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="io.vov.vitamio.v6"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWlvLnZvdi52aXRhbWlvLnY2EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  !!IMPORTANT!!<br>DON'T install or update this unless other apps let you install it. This is a library which won't work by itself.<p>This APK is for ARMv6 devices.</p><p><br>What's Vitamio</p><p>Vitamio is a multimedia framework for all Android devices. Vitamio works like the Android's default MediaPlayer except that it includes much more powerful features. And it's absolutely free !</p><p><br>Network Protocols</p><p>The following network protocols are supported for audio and video playback:</p><p>    MMS<br>    RTSP (RTP, SDP)<br>    HTTP progressive streaming<br>    HTTP live streaming (M3U8), for Android 2.1+</p><p><br>Media formats</p><p>Many audio and video codecs are packed into Vitamio beside the default media format built in Android platform, some of them are listed below.</p><p>    divx/xvid<br>    wmv<br>    flv<br>    ts<br>    rmvb<br>    mkv<br>    mov<br>    m4v<br>    avi<br>    mp4<br>    3gp</p><p></p><p>Subtitles</p><p>Vitamio support the display of many external and embedded subtitle formats.</p><p>    SubRip(.srt)<br>    Sub Station Alpha(.ssa) / Advanced Sub Station Alpha(.ass)<br>    SAMI(.smi/.sami)<br>    MicroDVD(.sub/.txt)<br>    SubViewer2.0(.sub)<br>    MPL2(.mpl/.txt)<br>    Matroska (.mkv) Subtitle Track</p><p></p><p>More features</p><p>There are more wonderful features available in Vitamio.</p><p>    Background playback<br>    Multiple audio tracks support<br>    Mutitiple subtitles support, including external and embedded ones<br>    Processor optimization for many platforms<br>    Buffering when streaming<br>    Adjustable aspect ratio<br>    Automatically text encoding detection</p><p>And many other features are waiting for you !</p><p><br>How to use Vitamio</p><p>Please refer our website at http://vitamio.org</p><p>Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any problems.</p><p></p><p>Privacy</p><p>We must notify you that Vitamio will collect those information to improve itself when you using it.<br>UniqueID generated from Device identifier</p><p>Vitamio reads your device identifier to generate an unique ID and collect the generated one instead of your device identifier. Most important, this generation can't be reversed. So don't worry about this, as it's not harmful.<br>Device's CPU features and screen size.</p><p>Vitamio will work on many different Android devices, different CPU architectures, different screen sizes and so on, so it needs to know the environment.<br>The app's package name which is using Vitamio</p><p>There're many apps which may use Vitamio, so Vitamio should know which process is using it to allocate proper resources.</p><p></p><p>Licenses</p><p>Vitamio uses sevral opensource projects, thanks to them.<br>FFmpeg, universalchardet</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> This is a library which won't work by itself.<p>This APK is for ARMv6 devices with VFP support.</p><p><br>What's Vitamio</p><p>Vitamio is a multimedia framework for all Android devices. Vitamio works like the Android's default MediaPlayer except that it includes much more powerful features. And it's absolutely free !</p><p><br>Network Protocols</p><p>The following network protocols are supported for audio and video playback:</p><p>    MMS<br>    RTSP (RTP, SDP)<br>    HTTP progressive streaming<br>    HTTP live streaming (M3U8), for Android 2.1+</p><p><br>Media formats</p><p>Many audio and video codecs are packed into Vitamio beside the default media format built in Android platform, some of them are listed below.</p><p>    divx/xvid<br>    wmv<br>    flv<br>    ts<br>    rmvb<br>    mkv<br>    mov<br>    m4v<br>    avi<br>    mp4<br>    3gp</p><p></p><p>Subtitles</p><p>Vitamio support the display of many external and embedded subtitle formats.</p><p>    SubRip(.srt)<br>    Sub Station Alpha(.ssa) / Advanced Sub Station Alpha(.ass)<br>    SAMI(.smi/.sami)<br>    MicroDVD(.sub/.txt)<br>    SubViewer2.0(.sub)<br>    MPL2(.mpl/.txt)<br>    Matroska (.mkv) Subtitle Track</p><p></p><p>More features</p><p>There are more wonderful features available in Vitamio.</p><p>    Background playback<br>    Multiple audio tracks support<br>    Mutitiple subtitles support, including external and embedded ones<br>    Processor optimization for many platforms<br>    Buffering when streaming<br>    Adjustable aspect ratio<br>    Automatically text encoding detection</p><p>And many other features are waiting for you !</p><p><br>How to use Vitamio</p><p>Please refer our website at http://vitamio.org</p><p>Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any problems.</p><p></p><p>Privacy</p><p>We must notify you that Vitamio will collect those information to improve itself when you using it.<br>UniqueID generated from Device identifier</p><p>Vitamio reads your device identifier to generate an unique ID and collect the generated one instead of your device identifier. Most important, this generation can't be reversed. So don't worry about this, as it's not harmful.<br>Device's CPU features and screen size.</p><p>Vitamio will work on many different Android devices, different CPU architectures, different screen sizes and so on, so it needs to know the environment.<br>The app's package name which is using Vitamio</p><p>There're many apps which may use Vitamio, so Vitamio should know which process is using it to allocate proper resources.</p><p></p><p>Licenses</p><p>Vitamio uses sevral opensource projects, thanks to them.<br>FFmpeg, universalchardet</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> href="/store/apps/details?id=air.RABBIT" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.RABBIT" title="RABBIT"> 184.    RABBIT  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Purplefishlab" title="Purplefishlab">Purplefishlab</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.RABBIT"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFAoSEhAKCmFpci5SQUJCSVQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  此APP發想的契機是團隊成員起初開始飼養兔子，剛接觸兔子時也都是上網搜尋資料，雖然資訊量不算少但內文有些部分不正確也不太完整，就開始思考，如果我們把飼養兔子的重點整理清楚，是否更加方便 ? 而造福了接下來的飼主 ? 不用在到處搜尋資料，也能一目了然的知道飼養重點。再來是當初構想此APP領養的部分，也是當初上網搜尋關於兔子方面資料時瀏覽到的 部落格-海綾月，發現到網站裡有許多待領養的兔子，幾乎都是狀況良好因飼主有不得已苦衷才送養出去的，但很少人知道會有棄兔的問題，所以我們才會構想出是否可以把這兩個元素結合，成為養兔人入手而更能接近認識兔子的APP。<br>現今APP非常的多元且也充分融入生活中，但很少專屬於兔子，多半是貓狗，所以我們也想讓更多人看見屬於的兔子部分，讓待領養的兔兔可以有更多人發覺，能有更多人知道兔兔世界的美好。 Can be used as comments or as markers for specific values on the plot.<br>		- Labels - both for series and axes<br>		- Legend	</p><p>CalendarView<br>	- Can display events from the device's calendar<br>	- Week, Month &amp; Year view<br>	- Single, Multiple &amp; Range selection<br>	- Customizable cells<br>	<br>SideDrawer (NavigationDrawer)<br>	- 11 predefined open/close animations<br>	- Can be opened from all edges of the screen<br>	- Customizable fade layer<br>	- Customizable drawer size</p><p>Data Source<br>	- A non-UI adapter that offers an easy way to sort, group and filter in-memory data. Used internally by the ListView. <br>	- The DataSource is most useful when used as a "data hub" where data is obtained, reshaped and sent to a view to be displayed. <br>	<br>AppFeedback <br>	- A component that exposes an easy way to gather feedback from your application users. The AppFeedback control is integrated with the Telerik Platform and provides a convenient way to manage the user feedback.<br>	<br>ScrollView<br>	- A control based on the native Android ScrollView that provides simultaneous horizontal and vertical scrolling.</p><p>New examples are added regularly. ISO Tolerances (DIN ISO 286-1)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=DZ" title="DZ">DZ</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="de.dzapps.iso_system_din286_1"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWRlLmR6YXBwcy5pc29fc3lzdGVtX2RpbjI4Nl8xEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Basic for calculating the fits is the complete (other comparable mobile applications just use an extract) DIN EN ISO 286-1 *.<p>No advertisement! No permissions!</p><p>Basic sizes from 0mm to 3150mm (according to DIN EN ISO 286-1, bigger dimensions aren't normed).</p><p>All International Tolerance Grades (IT-Grades) and fundamental dimensions are considered.</p><p>The app "ISO Tolerances" is a fit calculator and addressed to students, employees and apprentices (trainees) in all technical sectors. It calculates all information about a fit by entering a basic size in a matter of seconds. The app displays the upper and lower deviation, upper and lower limits as well as all specifications of the resulting fit. For clarification the relative positions of the tolerance zones are displayed in a graphic. You can also use this app just for translating the indication of a single tolerance (according to DIN EN ISO 286-1).</p><p>No responsibility is taken for the 	completeness, currentness and correctness of displayed data.</p><p>* complete title of the norm: "Geometrische Produktspezifikation (GPS) - ISO-Toleranzsystem für Längenmaße - Teil 1: Grundlagen für Toleranzen, Abmaße und Passungen (ISO 286-1:2010); Deutsche Fassung EN ISO 286-1:2010"</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sic.demo" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sic.demo" title="NFC Demo App by SIC"> 199.    NFC Demo App by SIC  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Silicon+Craft+Technology+Ltd." title="Silicon Craft Technology Ltd.">Silicon Craft Technology Ltd.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.sic.demo"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDGNvbS5zaWMuZGVtbxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This application is used to demonstrate SIC4310 NFC Enabler development kits developed by Silicon Craft Technology Ltd. (SIC). The NFC Enabler (SIC4310) is a dual-interface ISO14443A RFID tag, interfacing with both RF and UART. NFC Enabler is designed to be used in a various types of applications such as home appliances, personal healthcare, sport and fitness devices, etc. The key challenge is to deploy a low-cost NFC tag instead of an expensive full functional reader IC and use smartphones as a hub of information. As a result, this concept will enable a tremendous number of NFC applications on the smartphones.<p>See demos on our YouTube channel at https://www.youtube.com/user/SiliconCraft</p><p>Main features of SIC4310<br>- RF interface based on ISO14443A at 106 kbps<br>- UART interface 9600 to 115200 bps<br>- 8 programmable GPIOs<br>- Activity indicator pins (RF detection, RF busy and power ready)<br>- 228-byte EEPROM accessible from RF and UART</p><p>NOTE:<br>The application only supports NFC Enabler SIC4310 ICs from Silicon Craft Technology.</p><p>The demo applications are as follows.<br>1. GPIOs control<br>2. LEDs control<br>3. Firmware upgrade through NFC<br>4. LCD control<br>5. Temperature sensor <br>6. File transfer <br>7. SIC commands<br>8. Melody<br>9. Interactive poster<br>10. E-ink Camera<br>11. Room Controller <br>12. NDEF editor</p><p>The development kits are provided in five different forms.</p><p>1. SIC4310-MC: a 12.5 x 19.7 mm micro module with a UART interface and 4 GPIOs<br>2. SIC4310-USB: a 12.5 x 37.3 mm tiny module with a USB interface<br>3. SIC4310-HV: an energy harvesting module with a UART interface and 3 GPIOs. The on-board inductive antenna can generate a current up to 10 mA.<br>4. SIC4310-HVU: an energy harvesting module featuring UART and USB interfaces and two LEDs  that can be controlled via GPIO pins. The on-board inductive antenna can generate a current up to 10 mA.<br>5. SIC4310-FU: 47.6 x 107.9 mm ready-to-use kit featuring ARM Cortex M0 MCU, SIC4310, LCD, inductive antenna, two function buttons, temperature sensor, and connectors (I2C, SPI, UART, programming and debugging)<br>6. SIC4310-SP: a customizing board as e-ink, springboard etc.</p><p>Please contact support@sic.co.th if you have problems or feel free to contact us if you have any suggestions for additional features. This helps us to detect, analyze and fix possible issues you may encounter when using our demo application.</p><p>Version 1.0<br>Updated on Aug 26, 2013</p><p>Version 1.01<br>Updated on Aug 28, 2013</p><p>Version 1.02<br>Updated on Sep 2, 2013</p><p>Version 1.03<br>Updated on Sep 6, 2013</p><p>Version 1.04<br>Updated on Sep 12, 2013</p><p>Version 1.05<br>Updated on Sep 22, 2013</p><p>Version class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=tw.com.prolific.app.pl2303terminal" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=tw.com.prolific.app.pl2303terminal" title="Prolific PL2303 USB-UART"> 202.    Prolific PL2303 USB-UART  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Prolific+Technology+Inc." title="Prolific Technology Inc.">Prolific Technology Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="tw.com.prolific.app.pl2303terminal"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKInR3LmNvbS5wcm9saWZpYy5hcHAucGwyMzAzdGVybWluYWwQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Prolific announces the world's first and only Android USB Host API driver solution (NO root permission needed) for connecting PL2303 USB-to-Serial devices to Android-powered devices with USB Host mode support. Customers can now develop Android software (APP) based on the Android driver library provided by Prolific. <p> The PL2303 USB-to-Serial chip not only provides driver solutions for Windows/Mac/Linux but now also for Android OS platforms. The PL2303 Android driver library allows customers and developers to write Android applications to interface their UART/ RS232 / RS422 / RS485 devices with millions of Android USB host devices like Smartphones, Tablets, and Smart TVs.</p><p>This is just a terminal program, not used in the above specific device applications, such as GPS, cash register, modem,..etc...<br>Terminal program just for watching row data, if you have a specific purpose, please make sure your PL2303 chip model, you can download the SimpleTest APK source code from Prolific web-site, and then develop your own android application</p><p>Requirements:<br> ---------------------<br> - USB Device with PL2303HXD, PL2303EA or  PL2303RA controller chip<br>    NOTE: PL2303HXA and PL2303XA are not supported (Discontinued Products)<br> - Android-Powered Device (Tablet/Phones) with USB Host Mode Support<br> - Android 3.2 and above OS versions</p><p><br>Prolific recommends following vendor cable brands:</p><p>Product: href="/store/apps/details?id=com.arindam.FaceRecognition" title="Face recognition"> 205.    Face recognition  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Lakshmanan+Anbalagan" title="Lakshmanan Anbalagan">Lakshmanan Anbalagan</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.arindam.FaceRecognition"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJQojEiEKG2NvbS5hcmluZGFtLkZhY2VSZWNvZ25pdGlvbhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Face Recognition application can start experimenting with face recognition right away. <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="PROBAT Pilot Roaster Shop" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh3.ggpht.com/P9_Bdd6MxFcBfo_3QI4XVYxh6rNjx71isbn6CPPvmM2UbRHK2nGU_dTklHyMuwdk5w=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh3.ggpht.com/P9_Bdd6MxFcBfo_3QI4XVYxh6rNjx71isbn6CPPvmM2UbRHK2nGU_dTklHyMuwdk5w=w170-rw"
