class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.aioisystems.marbleport" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.aioisystems.marbleport" title="marblePORT"> 459.    marblePORT  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=AIOI+SYSTEMS+CO.,LTD." title="AIOI SYSTEMS CO.,LTD.">AIOI SYSTEMS CO.,LTD.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.aioisystems.marbleport"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS5haW9pc3lzdGVtcy5tYXJibGVwb3J0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  marblePORT is an auxiliary application that serves as a middleware to process communication with Smart-Tag or SmartCard (Products of AIOI・SYSTEMS Co, LTD.).  marblePORT can start up, perform communication processing by utilizing "Intent" from an application that wants to communicate with Smart Tag and return the result to the original application. It is, therefore, possible to create an application that utilizes Smart Tag by calling "Intent".<p>To execute an application that works with marblePORT, this application must be installed.</p><p>Details of Processing: <br>* Displays an image on the display.  <br>* Reads and writes user data.<br>* Gets the status of Smart Tag (IDm, residual battery power, etc.).<br>* Displays the status of Smart Tag (on the marblePORT screen). <br>* Registers the image shown on the display into Smart Tag.  <br>* Displays the image that has been registered in Smart Tag. <br>* Clears the display. <br>* Displays the text on the display.<br>* Smart Tag is scanned once for each processing mentioned above.  <br>* Displays messages and sets up functions with optional arguments (parameters). </p><p>Operating System:<br>* Android OS 2.3.3 or later versions<br>* NFC-enabled terminal  </p><p>Applicable Smart Tags:<br>* ST1020<br>* ST1027<br>* SC1029L</p><p>When Starting by Itself:  <br>When marblePORT starts up directly from the launcher, you can check the status of Smart Tag that has been touched. The status will be displayed on the mobile terminal screen (IDm, firmware version, residual battery power, etc.).</p><p>marblePORT Settings:<br>Can set the simultaneous transport block number. Please lower the simultaneous transport block number when communication fails.</p><p>When Developing an Application using marblePORT:<br>Please access the URL shown below. Download marblePORT Programming Guide, sample program and Helper Class.</p><p>"http://www.hello-aioi.com/rfid_smarttag/download.html"(Japanese)<br>"http://www.aioismarttag.com/login.php" (English)</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.aioisystems.marbleport" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.aioisystems.marbleport" tabindex="-1"> <div backnd"> 462.    Xvnc:X/X11 server w VNC backnd  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Nito+Martinez" title="Nito Martinez">Nito Martinez</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.theqvd.android.x"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS50aGVxdmQuYW5kcm9pZC54EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This is an implementation of an X Server for Android.<p>Note: This application is no longer mantained please use the QVD client with the embedded X server (accessible vía menu-&gt;Xvnc Console) or use the Xvnc Pro server.</p><p>Currently it only works for arm devices, that is the intel platform (x86) is not supported.</p><p>You can find new versions in xnvcpro: X X11 Windows server, or use the qvdclient embedded X server using menu-&gt;Xvnc Console. http://theqvd.com"&gt;QVD is a VDI platform which allows you, among other things, to bring Linux Apps to your phone.</p><p>This should be seen as a tool do port existing X11 applications to Android. See the help page for information about how to transparently invoke the X server from your application.</p><p>Information about how to use the X server with ssh to export remote display of your linux dektop can be found in the help section.</p><p>If you don't know what all this is then probably this application is not for you :-)</p><p>This work has been sponsored by Qindel for their QVD project, Select the camera used for head tracking from the menu. A front-facing camera is recommended but not required, there are options for camera calibration and mirroring if you want to use a back camera.<br>2. Select "Calibrate camera" from the menu, hold the device in a comfortable position and touch the screen. You will have to do this once for every orientation.<br>3. If the preview appears upside down, touch it to flip.</p><p>This application is a demo for head tracking based 3D visualization. href="/store/apps/details?id=my.codeandroid.headtracking3d" title="Head Tracking 3D"> 477.    Head Tracking 3D  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Yap+Wen+Jiun+(Malaysia)" title="Yap Wen Jiun (Malaysia)">Yap Wen Jiun (Malaysia)</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="my.codeandroid.headtracking3d"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHW15LmNvZGVhbmRyb2lkLmhlYWR0cmFja2luZzNkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Read this first!<br>* Please make sure the lighting on your face is good enough<br>* Please make sure your face is more or less straight, not rotated too much, not tilted too much<br>* Try the debug mode to check whether the face detection works or not<br>* If one of the implementation fails, please report it and try the other one <p>Head Tracking 3D demonstrates the ability of the front facing camera on Android devices to detect the face of the user to provide a head-tracking virtual reality display. The application has been developed and tested with Asus Transformer, Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 &amp; Notion Ink Adam because of their fast processing speed. The 3D rendering part of the App is based on my previous Android application "3D Depth Cues Demo" and the face detection is based on the Google Code project JavaCV and the OpenCV Android port.</p><p>The App can however still be used with other Android devices, using the rear facing camera and inverting the X-axis, together with a mirror to reflect yourself or a photo of a human face.  </p><p>Community project by Yap Wen Jiun (http://wenjiun.blogspot.com) from CodeAndroid Malaysia (http://www.codeandroid.my).</p><p>Credits:<br>* OpenCV at http://opencv.willowgarage.com/wiki/Android for the face detection<br>* JavaCV at http://code.google.com/p/javacv/ for the face detection using OpenCV <br>* Android API Demos at http://developer.android.com/resources/samples/ApiDemos/index.html for the general OpenGL rendering into a SurfaceView and the rendering of camera preview <br>* akjava-android-project at http://code.google.com/p/akjava-android-project/ for the generation of 3D solids <br>* Wii Projects by Johnny Chung Lee Wii at http://johnnylee.net/projects/wii/ for the inspiration of headtracking</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a The (I) Investopedia Guide  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MobiSystems" title="MobiSystems">MobiSystems</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.mobisystems.msdict.embedded.wireless.mcgrawhill.investopedia"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaSgpIEkYKQGNvbS5tb2Jpc3lzdGVtcy5tc2RpY3QuZW1iZWRkZWQud2lyZWxlc3MubWNncmF3aGlsbC5pbnZlc3RvcGVkaWEQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The Investopedia Guide to Wall Speak presents in-depth definitions of the site’s most searched terms.<br>Covering everything from the basics to more advanced concepts the Guide provides thorough encyclopedic explanations of terms and concepts.<p>This is a fully functioning trial.</p><p>The Investopedia Guide to Wall Speak will be a compilation of Investopedia's top-searched terms under the following categories: Stocks, Bonds, Mutual Funds, Options &amp; Futures, Retirement Planning, Foreign Exchange, Taxes, and "Buzzwords". The software will follow Investopedia.com's format, giving the definition of the term plus a short explanation putting the term in context--the "Investopedia Says" commentary that offers real-life scenarios relevant to each investment term.<br>The Investopedia Guide to Wall Speak will be an entertaining and informative book, not a heavy-duty reference guide.</p><p><br> A SEARCH TOOL</p><p>featuring search autocomplete to help you find words quickly by displaying predictions similar to the terms you're typing. You also get enhanced search extras including:</p><p> • A quick search of words while you type.<br> • A 'fuzzy filter' for when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word.<br> • A 'keyword' search for finding key words within compound words.<br> • A wild card search function ('*' or '?') which can replace a letter or entire parts of a word.<br> • Download dictionary definitions locally for offline word lookup.</p><p>A LEARNING TOOL</p><p>including a number of features that help you further enhance your vocabulary:</p><p> • A 'Favorites' feature to create custom folders with lists of words from the extensive library, including cross-curriculum words.<br> • History list to help you easily review looked-up words.<br> • Discover more using the included special language notes.<br> • See words in context with example sentences.<br> • 'Word-of-the-day' feature with dedicated homescreen widget.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> href="/store/apps/details?id=net.kuratkoo.locusaddon.geogetdatabase" title="Locus - addon GeoGet Database"> 503.    Locus - addon GeoGet Database  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Radim+Vaculik" title="Radim Vaculik">Radim Vaculik</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="net.kuratkoo.locusaddon.geogetdatabase"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaMAouEiwKJm5ldC5rdXJhdGtvby5sb2N1c2FkZG9uLmdlb2dldGRhdGFiYXNlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Since new version of Locus 1.14.6 comes new addon – GeoGet database. Do you know GeoGet? GeoGet is geocache manager, where you can manage your final waypoints, add notes or waypoints to geocache or import/export geocache from/to GeoGet.<p>This addon provide connection between GeoGet database, where geocaches are save, and Locus, great map tool for Android! So you can view all your GeoGet geocache in Locus, manage final waypoints, view listing, etc. And everything offline!</p><p>It’s simple – install plugin, copy your GeoGet database to SD card, setup addon and run Locus. And just import geocaches.</p><p>Instructions: <br>1. Set correct path to GeoGet database on your SD card<br>2. Change filter in settings, if you want<br>3a. Add this addon on right-side panel and click on it.<br>3b. Tap on map (hold finger), select last icon in bottom menu – Settings and select Load GeoGet geocaches.<br>4. Done!</p><p>Looking for volunteers who would like to help with the translation of this application. Contact me - kuratkoo@gmail.com</p><p>For speed improvement please run Plugins → Oprava Databáze → Vacuum database in GeoGet.</p><p>Tags: geoget, database, locus, geocaching</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=net.kuratkoo.locusaddon.geogetdatabase" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=net.kuratkoo.locusaddon.geogetdatabase" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.6 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 91.1876106262207%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="net.kuratkoo.locusaddon.geogetdatabase"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaMAouEiwKJm5ldC5rdXJhdGtvby5sb2N1c2FkZG9uLmdlb2dldGRhdGFiYXNlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> </div> </div>   </div></div>  </div> </div>   </div></div><div class="secondary-content"></div><div> <script>(function(){var fu=true;var pt='程式庫與試用程式類熱門免費下載 - Google Play Android 應用程式';var ab='';var lmt='';var curl='https://play.google.com/store/apps/category/LIBRARIES_AND_DEMO/collection/topselling_free?authuser\0750';var nbp='[\42https://play.google.com/store/apps/category/LIBRARIES_AND_DEMO/collection/topselling_free?authuser\\u003d0\42,null,\04260\42,\04260\42,\0420\42]\n';var sc='';var pgj=false;var di='apps_topselling_free';var du=0;window.updateClient = function(){if (fu){if (pt){upt(pt);}
